welcome.name: I'm Andrea
welcome.subtitle: Glad to see you on my portfolio website
welcome.description: Here you can explore my <1>skills</1>, get to know my <1>personal projects</1>, and also find my <1>contacts</1> to get in touch with me.

about.interests: Front-End and Back-End developer. Also interested in desktop applications based on WPF.
about.information1: I am a student of the <1>Software Engineering</1> program at Lviv Polytechnic National University. I have a strong passion for developing modern web and desktop applications that combine usability, efficiency, and user value.
about.information2: I work with technologies such as <1>ASP.NET, Entity Framework Core, MySQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, WPF</1>. I am constantly improving my skills in software architecture, databases, frontend, and server-side development.
about.information3: In the future, I aim to create innovative and useful software solutions that have a positive impact on society. I believe that technology is a tool for making the world a better place.

alhimik_game.name: Alchemist Game
alhimik_game.intro: <1>“Alchemist”</1> is an RPG system developed to demonstrate 9 classic design patterns.
alhimik_game.story: The player takes on the role of an alchemist who travels through locations, gathers ingredients, creates potions according to recipes, and participates in quests and battles with monsters.
alhimik_game.ending: The project demonstrates the practical application of architectural principles in game system development, creating a scalable and maintainable codebase.

simple_code.name: SimpleCode code editor
simple_code.intro: I developed a <1>C/C++ code editor</1> using C# and WPF, following the MVVM architecture. The editor is designed to provide a modern, smooth workflow for developers.
simple_code.features: The application supports project management, code editing, compilation via G++, and real-time file synchronization with external changes.
simple_code.tech_mvvm: <1>MVVM</1> architecture for a clean separation of concerns.
simple_code.capability_create_project: Create new projects (as folders) directly from the editor.
simple_code.capability_open_project: Open and manage existing C/C++ projects.
simple_code.capability_code_editing: Edit and manage multiple code files within the editor.
simple_code.capability_compile_run: Compile and run C/C++ code via the built-in terminal.
simple_code.capability_sync: Automatic synchronization with changes from external applications.
simple_code.ending: This project combines my knowledge of desktop development, compiler integration, and clean architectural design to deliver a functional tool for C/C++ developers.
